experiment_info.name: mini_batch_sensor_eval
experiment_info.description: Use random 50% of sensors for CMA-ES screening, full sensors for final polish
experiment_info.hypothesis: A random 50% of sensors may be sufficient to estimate candidate quality during exploration

tuning_runs.notes: Score improved vs baseline but time over budget. Sensor masking doesn't save simulation time.

conclusion: FAILED - Mini-batch sensor evaluation cannot save time because PDE simulation cost is independent of sensor count. Sensor sampling is negligible (<1% of total time). This approach is fundamentally flawed.
